name: Jack Nicklaus presents The Major Championship Courses of 1990
overview: This is another add-on to original American Jack Nicklaus' Greatest 18 Holes of Major Championship Golf or its European remake Jack Nicklaus' Unlimited Golf & Course Design contains extra course disk including: Medinah Country Club (U.S. Open Championship) St. Andrews Old Course (British Open Championship) Shoal Creek (PGA Championship)
